subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa, who joined Mark McGwire in 1998 in pursuit of the single-season home run record, is said to be among players who tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug.
snippet: Sammy Sosa, who joined Mark McGwire in 1998 in pursuit of the single-season home run record, is said to be among players who tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug.
